Package org.kj.pxe.protocol.impl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BootServerInformation
    Contains the information for one subset of the BootServers suboption - the list of servers of a particular type.
    DhcpOption
    Represents the data contained in a DHCP option.
    DhcpPacketImpl
    Stores all of the data fields of a DHCP packet as specified by https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2131.txt.
    DhcpRequestPacketImpl
    An object that represents a DHCP Ack packet.
    DiscoverPeerHandler
    Receives a DHCP discover message and sends and offer as reply
    PxeMenuPromptSuboption
    Represents the Pxe menu prompt suboption in DHCP option 43.
    RequestPeerHandler  
    VendorOptions
    Represents DHCP option 43, a.k.a.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DhcpOpField
    Contains the Op Code field for the 2 different types of Dhcp Messages: Boot request (1) and Boot reply (2).
    DhcpOptionTag
    Represents different possible values of DHCP option tage.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DhcpOptionDataIncorrectException
    Exception to be thrown when the data in a DHCP option is not the correct value
    DhcpPacketToByteConversionException
    Exception when converting a DHCP packet to bytes.
    DhcpTagNotFoundException
    Exception thrown thrown when a DHCP option with a certain tag is not found
    PxeDhcpException
    Exception thrown when there is an error PXE booting using the DHCP protocol
